name: BABE Fusion Pro - 1pk
description:
Keratin Bond Method

When you feel comfortable, you feel confident. That’s why stylists have been using the Fusion method longer than any other. The adorably natural feel of fusion is refreshing and fun. 

This tried-and-true technique involves connecting extensions to hair with keratin bonds. (Yes, that same keratin protein that your hair is made of!) Each extension strand comes pre-tipped, with the keratin bond ready to go. Each strand is individually attached for a 360 degree movement for ultimate styling potential. 

 - Application time: 2 to 3 hours
 - May be reused up to 3 times (with Rebonds)
 - Lasts 2 to 4 months with proper care 

27 colors to choose from!

name: BABE I-Tip Pro - 1 pk
description:
Beaded Method

Every strand of your hair will be enhanced with the 360 degree movement of I-Tip Extensions. You might not know what to do with your hair’s volume, length, and versatility. That’s okay. Wear it up or down, the beads are easy to hide--especially since they come in five fabulous colors. 

 I-Tip installation is a snap! Microbeads are clamped to securely hold each hair extension strand in place. That means your hair can be long and full without the worry of slippage. This amazing method has absolutely no chemicals, no glue, and no heat. 

 - May be reused up to 3 times
 - Application time: 1 to 2 hours
 - Lasts 3 to 6 months with proper care 

29 colors to choose from!

name: BABE Tape-In Human Hair Extensions (1 PK)
description:
Seamless Finish
100% Human Hair Tape In Extensions 
This brand-new method is a showstopper. Installation is astonishingly fast and the look is shamelessly seamless. Clients are raving about how Tape-Ins provide length and volume and blend easily into hair. 

This revolutionary method installs in as little as 30 minutes, so you’ll be looking fabulous in no time. And because it’s so speedy, it will save you precious time and money. The medical grade adhesive is designed for hair, so with proper care, tape won’t weaken until you’re ready to remove it with the help of our trusty Tape-In Bond Remover. 

 - May be reused up to 3 times
 - Application time: 30 minutes to 1 hour
 - Lasts 3 to 6 months with proper care

Remy hair is clinically washed, dyed, and revitalized. This process ensures natural conditioners and moisturizers are restored to each strand of hair.
29 colors to choose from!
10 pieces per pack
18" length
1.5" wide.
4pks for full head application
* Easy application to save time
* Hair that won't tangle
* Affordable price
* Durable, long lasting tape
* Smaller packs to there's no waste
* Tape and hair can be reused
* Tape that is not too gooey
* Wide variety of colors
* Tape size that can create length, volume or highlights

name: BABE Full Head Clip-Ins
description:
Versatile Length

Sometimes you just don’t want to commit. We get it. With Clip-In extensions, you can have length and volume in minutes. And when you’re done, simply unclip and remove. You can install them yourself, or with the help of a stylist. Because they are so easy to put in and out, your look can change in an instant.

Clip-Ins are made with the same quality 100% human hair as our other extensions, so they can be styled just like your own hair. 

- Application time:5 to 15 minutes
 - Last 6 to 12 months with proper care 

15 colors to choose

name: BABE Replacement Tape: Tape-In Extensions
description:
Color: Clear/Qty: 48 Pieces
Double Sided/Medical Grade Adhesive/Pre-Cut

Make your Tape-In Extensions last longer with Babe’s replacement tape. Simply remove the old tape adhesive with the Tape-In Bond Remover and adhere the double-sided tape to the wefts. Then just install as normal. The tape is medical grade and is shaped precisely for Babe Tape-In Extensions.

name: BABE Tape-In Bond Remover
description:
Removes Tape-In Extensions/Oil Based
Safe for Hair/4 fl. oz 

Removing Tape-In Extensions is easy with our specially formulated Tape-In Bond Remover. Using the right product to take out your client’s extensions is important to preserve the quality of the hair. 

The oil-based remover helps the extension tape adhesive weaken, so it slides out of hair easily. Only a small amount of remover is needed for each weft. After the extensions are removed, we recommend clarifying your client’s hair. You can order replacement tape strips to reuse the wefts.

name: BABE Keratin Bond Remover
description:
Removes Fusion Extension Bonds/Safe for Hair
Alcohol-Based/4 fl. oz

When it’s time to remove those beautiful Fusion Extensions, we have the solution you need. It’s our Keratin Bond Remover, which breaks down the keratin bonds so you can slide the hair extensions out of the natural hair.

Dab a small bit on the keratin bond. Let it set for a few seconds, then use the Hair Extension Tool to squeeze the bond until it breaks and loosens. After the extensions are removed, wash hair.

Don’t use the Keratin Bond Remover to remove Tape-In Extensions. (We have a Tape-In Remover for that.)

name: BABE Dry Shampoo
description:
DRY SPRAY SHAMPOO
Formulated for Hair Extensions
Fresh, clean hair in minutes!

160 ml 5.35 fl.oz net wt. (3.35 oz) 95g

Babe Dry Spray Shampoo is specially formulated for use with hair extensions. Designed to rejuvenate the hair between washes, Babe Dry Spray Shampoo effortlessly removes oil and product buildup without causing damage. Simply spray it on your hair and extensions, and then style as usual! And you’ll love the hint of vanilla scent.

name: Deposit for Hair Extensions/Sew In Weave Services
description:
At Divalicious Salon we take pride in our hair extensions. Our Hair Extension Specialist has been trained in a variety of different techniques. We know how important it is to receive a Professional & Natural Hair Extensions and Sew In Weave Experience and our #1 goal is to provide that for you!

Since we have been receiving an overwhelming amount of clients interested in our hair extension services, we have implemented a $100 deposit. The deposit is required upon scheduling your appointment and is necessary to hold your appointment. This deposit will be applied to the balance of your service. After your deposit is received you can rest assured that your stylist will be available and will provide you a Hair Extension / Sew In Weave experience like no other.

COME EXPERIENCE THE DIFFERENCE

This deposit is non-refundable and will be forfeited if you cancel or reschedule in less than 24 hours of your scheduled appointment.

categories.name: Deposit for Hair Extensions / Sew In Weave Services
